document.body:
Canada dry Exit this survey
1 . What is your location? Age? Gender? What is your location? Age? Gender? 2 . Which is your favorite Ginger ale?
Which is your favorite Ginger ale? Captain Morgan Schweppes Canada Dry Other 3 . Describe Canada Dry in only one word. Describe Canada Dry in only one word. 4 . Do you think Canada dry is healthier than Coke or Pepsi?
Do you think Canada dry is healthier than Coke or Pepsi? Yes No 5 . Select any of these adjectives that you would associate with Schweppes Ginger Ale.
Select any of these adjectives that you would associate with Schweppes Ginger Ale. Sophisticated Sporty Refreshing Cool Fashionable 6 . Select any of these adjectives that you would associate with Canada dry Ginger Ale.
Select any of these adjectives that you would associate with Canada dry Ginger Ale. Sophisticated Sporty Refreshing Cool Fashionable 7 . Where was the last place you saw Canada Dry?
Where was the last place you saw Canada Dry? Online Advertisement Posters Promotional Event TV Advertisement In a Shop 8 . When was the last time you saw a Canada dry advertisement?
When was the last time you saw a Canada dry advertisement? A week ago. A month ago. 6 months ago. Last Year. Never. 9 . Select any these locations you are likely to have a Canada Dry.
Select any these locations you are likely to have a Canada Dry. Outdoor Picnic. Night Club. Lunch Break. Fast Food restaurant. House Party. Classy restaurant. Formal Events 10 . Why would you buy Canada Dry?
Why would you buy Canada Dry? Great Taste Ginger ingredient Cool Sophisticated Non-Caffeinated Powered by SurveyMonkey Check out our sample surveys and create your own now! Javascript is required for this site to function, please enable.
